message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your offer, but $60 is too low for me. Could you do $100?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $70. Can you meet me in the middle at $85?
